txt.en: Sara Oakheart has been defeated.  You have failed
You have escorted Sara Oakheart to safety
Sara Oakheart was found prisoner in the depths of Fornost. She needs your help getting free and back to the safety of her home.
'Hurry let's get out of here before more Orcs come. Follow me!'
Sara Oakheart was apparently taken captive by the Blogmal Orcs while she was gathering wild herbs. She needs you to escort her out of Fornost.

'If you're the person I think you are, I have something for you from a short little white-haired Woman.  Sella something...\n'Oakheart, right.  So this is for you.\n'What?  No, I haven't any idea why.  Rescued her?  Oh.  Well, er, good for you, then?'
Sara Oakheart was apparently taken captive by the Blogmal Orcs while she was gathering wild herbs. She needs you to escort her out of Fornost.
'Hurry let's get out of here before more Orcs come. Follow me!'
Tell someone in Fornost camp about rescuing Sara Oakheart
